summary:
As an experienced solution-oriented finance professional with an eye for detail and expertise in the field of controlling and foreign currency management I excel in an environment with core values respect, balance and development. I am emphatic and authentic, which I successfully use for constructive thinking and asking questions to connect with the need and considerations of the other person. This has proved to be valuable in a coordinating role with many contacts in the organization. 
My analytical attitude, passion and the interest to build expertise I use to realize projects, process improvements and implementations. I feel inspired in an open team that focuses together on results and added value for the organization.

Together Everyone Achieves More

projects.title: Hedging 2.0
projects.description: Development and implementation of significant process improvements (LEAN) in the committed hedging process (Hedging 2.0) in direct cooperation with Treasury resulting in a much more effective process and cost saving (from 2,6 to 1,0 FTE, decrease of transaction costs, time saving).

projects.title: Gemini implications on hedging
projects.description: Roll out / implement Gemini implications concerning to hedging process AccOps LS in close cooperation with Treasury and all other parties involved.

projects.title: Change FX policy Philips for multiple sector
projects.description: Roll out new FX-policy Treasury from Hedging AccOps perspective in cooperation with all other parties involved.

projects.title: Disentanglement Lumileds from Hedging AccOps perspective
projects.description: Disentanglement of the hedging process regarding to 3 Lighting ORU's towards external company Lumileds including knowledge transfer in cooperation with all involved parties.

projects.title: Lighting Fiscal Invoicing Project
projects.description: Implement changes related to changes in the fiscal invoicing project in the hedging process of the ORU's in scope of Hedging AccOps LS.

projects.title: Global Lighting FX Project - CoE Hedging FinOps
projects.description: Roll out changed FX-policy from Hedging AccOps LS perspective including extension of ORU's in scope of Hedging AccOps LS in cooperation with all involved.

courses.name: Courses and workshops in the field of communication, skills, systems and subject content
Philips Accounting HEAO Bachelors - Internal Philips block course

profile_positions.description:
ClaritY in Finance offers entrepreneurs the opportunity to use Finance expertise in their company in a flexible way, because as a virtual Finance Professional I am available from a few hours per month without major financial risks for the client and without the need for a workplace. This can concern specific assignments or a role as a part-time controller / business partner.
I am a reliable and committed business partner in the field of Finance and I like structure and clarity. I am eager to learn, curious and like to think along with entrepreneurs about the world behind the numbers (also beyond the borders of Finance).

I would like to understand what you encounter as a customer, so that I can help you and think positively with you. I would like to support and advise you as an entrepreneur in the field of Finance:

•	Business & Financial Controlling
•	Projects, process improvements, implementations
•	Finance related topics (such as IT and AO/IC)

If desired and in consultation I can and want to delve into other areas as well.
I have a special interest in health care, education, welfare, law and real estate.

Although I initially focus on (small to medium-sized) companies and organizations, I am also available to private individuals on special request for support and advice in the financial field.

Do you have a question or would you like to consult without obligation to see if and what I can do for you? Please feel free to contact me by sending your request directly to  yolande@clarityinfinance.nl so that I can call or e-mail you about the possibilities.
profile_positions.title: Freelance Controller / Business Partner (parttime)

profile_positions.description:
Contribute to the development and implementation of a financial vision of the entire organization. Setting up and monitoring (financial) processes and the availability of management information.

Main results:
- Initiate and implement improvements in the administrative organization (map processes and points for improvement, booking processes, implementation of cost centers and budget responsibilities).
- Thinking along and contributing to changes / structure that is necessary to shift the focus as a scale-up from development to production.
- Important contribution to the definition and roll-out of a new procurement procedure.
- Coordinating role with regard to regional, national and European subsidies, including Interreg.
profile_positions.title: Financial Controller

profile_positions.description:
Project aimed at improvement, harmonization and assurance of the fixed assets process. 

Main results: 
- Overview of issues to be covered / prevented (upon meetings with stakeholders and investigations of the FA process).
- Project improvement team established. 
- Definition of the project including proposed timeline.
- Alignment and provision of input for harmonized template to be used for fixed asset requests (taking into account requirements 4 SSC’s and issues from general issue list FA).
- Providing input for improvement of workinstructions. 
- Knowledge transfer of project status.
profile_positions.title: Process Improvement Controller

profile_positions.location: Philips Lighting B.V. / After company split: Signify - Eindhoven
profile_positions.description:
Hedge foreign currency risks (hedging and cash management) focused on minimization of the impact of currency exchange rate changes on the operating result. Coordination of all Lighting entities in scope. Key contact for Treasury Lighting. Main aspects: AO/IC, reporting, hedge accounting, hedge effectiveness, coaching team members, signalling, support of audits, advising and currency result analysis.  

Main results:
- Development and implementation of significant process improvements (LEAN) in the committed hedging process (Hedging 2.0) in direct cooperation with Treasury resulting in a much more effective process and cost saving (from 2,6 to 1,0 FTE, decrease of transaction costs, time saving). The new approach is aimed at an effective and efficient hedging for Lighting company as a whole.
- Important contribution to the company split of Philips and Philips Lighting (Gemini project). 
- Perform tests of and contribute to the design of the new seperate Dealstation system for Lighting from key user point of view in close cooperation with Treasury. 
- Coordination / coaching hedging Lighting team.
- Successful alignment with and monitoring of the Shared Service Center in Poland resulting in extension of outsourced activities.
profile_positions.title: FX Risk Controller - Lead Hedging Lighting

profile_positions.location: Philips Electronics Netherlands B.V., Philips Accounting Operations - Eindhoven
profile_positions.description:
Hedge foreign currency risks (hedging and cash management) focused on minimization of the impact of currency exchange rate changes on the operating result. Coordination of all Lighting entities in scope. Key contact for Treasury Lighting. Main aspects: AO/IC, reporting, hedge accounting, hedge effectiveness, signalling, support of audits, advising and currency result analysis.  

Main results: 
- Start of centralized hedging function within Philips (cross sector).
- Perform system tests of changes in and new version of Dealstation (User Acceptance Test) from key user point of view in close cooperation with Treasury.
- Implementation, taking initiative and advising on: hedging policy changes (among which: different level of hedging, new anticipated approach upon FX footprint), process improvements and harmonization (cross-sector).  
- Initiatived and created proposal for implementation sector approach and creation hedging Center of Expertise (CoE) with successful roll out. 
- Coaching team members regarding hedging Lighting entities.
- Coordination start up and implementation of Global Lighting FX Project (significant expansion of hedging activities for Lighting entities within the scope of our team) – Global CoE Lighting. 
- Coordination of the separation of Lumileds (BEN-project) from Philips Lighting per 01/04/2015.
profile_positions.title: FX Risk Controller - Sector Lead Lighting

profile_positions.location: Logistic Competence Centre (LCC) Eindhoven, Philips Lighting DC Brabant B.V. - Eindhoven
profile_positions.description:
Business economic support including reporting, budgetting, analysis, coordination, hedging, administrative organisation / internal control (AO/IC), project participation and signalling.

Main results:
- Guidance and implementation of the migration of accounting activities to the Shared Service Center in Poland.
- Key user in test and implementation of new hedging application.
- Project participation at the introduction of the Export Order Desk.
- Performing hedging for LCC Lamps (warehouse Lighting) including implementing improvements.
profile_positions.title: Controller LCC Lamps Eindhoven

profile_positions.location: Philips EMT (ICC) / Assembléon Netherlands B.V. - Eindhoven, Veldhoven
profile_positions.description:
Financial support of Business Lines CSM, ASP, OSW and TriScan and later the Supply Chain process within the International Competence Centre (ICC) as Product Team Controller till mid 2000. 
Mid 2000 change from product to process orientation. My function than changed from Product Team Controller to Supply Chain Controller. 
In both functions I was part of a multidisciplinary team (Product Teams, Supply Chain MT).

Main results: 
- Increasing financial awareness through advice, constructive thinking and explanation of results. 
- Member of Product Team / Supply Chain MT.
- Sparring partner. 
- Support forecast and budgetprocess. 
- Involvement in portfolio management.
- Provide contribution to hedging process.
- Initiate and implement improvement projects. 
- Involved in implementation change to process-oriented job classification.
- Participation in the simplification of the department structure including project time registration.
- Definition and testing of project reporting.

Responsibilities:
- The business economic support of the Lines of Business / Supply Chain.
- Collecting, recording, analyzing, publishing and presenting the financial data of the LoBs / Supply Chain.
- Supports LoBs / Supply Chain during the forecast process and the annual budgeting process.
- Supports LoBs / Supply Chain with the help of Modern Cost Management tools such as Activity Based Cost management and Product life cycle management.
- The initiation and implementation of improvement projects to achieve a process of continuous quality improvement.
- Takes care of the creation and maintenance of a description of the administration and the administrative internal control possibilities.
profile_positions.title: Line of Business Controller, Supply Chain Controller

profile_positions.description:
Assisting the Business Unit (BU) Fixed Resistors (Conventional and RSMD) controller as well as the financial support of the staff departments.

Main results: 
- Successfully assisted the Business Unit Controller of Fixed Resistors (Conventional and RSMD) and replace in his absence. 
- Financial support for all staff departments of the plant including budgeting, subsequent calculation and reporting. 
- Financial support for split and sale conventional fixed resistors business to external company (Yageo).
- Determining department budgets in collaboration with department managers.
- Analyzing and discussing results.
- Involved in implementation of new local logistics system and later BAAN.
- Support the Site Controller.
- Backup for bookkeeper.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Controller Fixed Resistors & Staf

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the general ledger of plant Philips Roermond, the group reporting and the financial support of the staff departments. 

Main Results: 
- Ensuring correct, reliable and timely closure and (group) reporting.
- First point of contact for staff departments.
- Assist the Site Controller.
- Consistent follow-up of action points administrative organization / internal control (AO/IC).
- Coordination around sign authority for the plant.
profile_positions.title: Bookkeeper - Philips Plant Roermond

profile_positions.description: Administrative Organization / Internal Control concerning the development process for all Business Units of the plant.
profile_positions.title: HEAO Graduation Internship

volunteer_experiences.description:
Provided support by reading and providing input regarding the book "Bonky's Biografie". This book tells about the life of a Labrador Retriever Bonky (Picasso's greatest friend) from the dog's perspective. 
ISBN 978 94 9324 003 2 - NUR 31, Uitgeverij U2pi / www.kelbo.nl
